elements.title: Lamont Landers: ‘Lotta Love’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Lamont Landers: ‘Lotta Love’

 Best New Music

Alabama-based Lamont Landers funnels himself into his songs, infusing each note with raw power and grit.

May 23

elements.title: MRCY: ‘Wandering Attention’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
MRCY: ‘Wandering Attention’

 Best New Music

You probably recognize MRCY ’s “Wandering Attention” from our recent world premiere on Morning Becomes Eclectic.

May 22

elements.title: Sharp Pins: ‘Sycophant’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Sharp Pins: ‘Sycophant’

 Best New Music

Chi-town indie artist Kai Slater records their quirky, nostalgic, lo-fi ditties under the moniker Sharp Pins. They also produce a rad ‘zine called HALLOGALLO .

May 21

elements.title: The Doobie Brothers: ‘Learn To Let Go’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
The Doobie Brothers: ‘Learn To Let Go’

 Best New Music

Grammy-winners, Rock & Roll Hall of Fame inductees, and big time hit-makers The Doobie Brothers have still got it. On June 6, they will release their 16th studio album Walk This Road.

May 20

elements.title: Galactic & Irma Thomas: ‘Where I Belong’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Galactic & Irma Thomas: ‘Where I Belong’

 Best New Music

Eighty four year-old Irma Thomas is the “Soul Queen of New Orleans.” Galactic is a band that’s spent the last three decades generating uncompromising funk music.

May 19

elements.title: Bob Moses: ‘Time of Your Life’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Bob Moses: ‘Time of Your Life’

 Best New Music

After their surprise Coachella sets last month, Grammy-winning production/songwriting duo Bob Moses decided to let the hits keep coming.

May 16

elements.title: Annahstasia: ‘Be Kind’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Annahstasia: ‘Be Kind’

 Best New Music

Bewitching vocals ,luscious lyrics, classic jazz with a folk twist — all this and more is what you’ll hear in Annahstasia ’s “Be Kind.”

May 15

elements.title: Gatlin: ‘If She Was A Boy’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Gatlin: ‘If She Was A Boy’

 Best New Music

When the artist Gatlin was ready to write new material for her debut album, she knew that she needed to recruit some talented queer women to help. .

May 14
